spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: Staticcfg_ECOrevnum_Slave
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: ECO Revision tie-off. Configures the ECO revision number in Peripheral ID register Register 3 to show revision changes during ECO of the chip design process.

spirit:field.spirit:name: read_data
spirit:field.spirit:description: Sampled at pin. Read back value goes through double flip-flop

spirit:field.spirit:name: read_data
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current value of data output register

spirit:register.spirit:name: MASKHIGHBYTE
spirit:register.spirit:description: Higher eight bits masked access. Bits[9:2] of the

spirit:port.spirit:name: HREADYOUT
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB ready output to S->M mux

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: ALTERNATE_FUNC_MASK
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Alternate function bit mask. Indicates which ports can have an alternate function instead of GPIO logic. Default 16'hFFFF so all ports can have alternate functions

spirit:value.spirit:prompt: Alternate function bit mask. Indicates which ports can have an alternate function instead of GPIO logic.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: ALTERNATE_FUNC_DEFAULT
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Alternate function default value. Indicates which ports are used with alternate function. Default 16'h0000 so all pins are used as GPIO

spirit:value.spirit:prompt: Alternate function default value. Indicates which ports are used with alternate function.

spirit:fileSet.spirit:name: RTL
spirit:fileSet.spirit:description: This fileset describes the synthesizable RTL source files for this component
